dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: Logo infringements - FAPL_NRID12353]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 03, 2006 1:44 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FA Premier League: Logo infringements -
FAPL_NRID12353]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Received:         from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52]) by
mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
with esmtp (Exim) id 1FQP6O-00048e-Nh; Mon, 03 Apr 2006 08:28:16 -0500
Received:         from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
TimC@nr-online.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1FQP6M-00048O-CG for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 03 Apr 2006 08:28:14 -0500
Received:         from email.nr-online.com ([217.204.130.186]) by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from TimC@nr-online.com) with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FQP6I-0009NT-TR for
abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 03 Apr 2006 08:28:13 -0500
Received:         (qmail 23633 invoked by uid 89); 3 Apr 2006 14:27:02 +0100
Received:         from unknown (HELO D6YK112J) (192.168.50.112) by 0 (qmail
1.03 + ejcp v14) with SMTP; 3 Apr 2006 14:27:02 +0100
From:         Tim Cooper <TimC@nr-online.com>
To:         <admin@nis.nnov.su>
Date:         Mon, 3 Apr 2006 14:28:06 +0100
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/alternative;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0030_01C6572A.D2ABB870"
X-Mailer:         Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.6353
Thread-Index:         AcZXInDPEBN4kdswR7u25pMK5tJe7Q==
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2670
Received-SPF:         pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of nr-online.com
designates 217.204.130.186 as permitted sender) client-ip=217.204.130.186;
envelope-from=TimC@nr-online.com; helo=email.nr-online.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.1
Cc:         abuse@theplanet.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] FA Premier League: Logo infringements -
FAPL_NRID12353
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.7
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



NetResult Internal Reference:  FAPL_NRID12353



Please quote the above FAPL_NRID12353 reference in all communications with
us regarding this issue.



We write on behalf of The FA Premier League, in respect of certain
intellectual property rights including football Club Crests and the FA
Premier League/Barclays Premiership logos.



We have noticed that your website, www.brandsoftheworld.com
<http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/> is displaying The FA Premier League club
crests and the FA Premier League/Barclays Premiership logos.



We wish to make you aware that we have a good faith belief that your present
use is an infringement of the The FA Premier League's legal rights and that
all such unauthorised use must cease immediately. Please confirm by return
your agreement to this and give your undertaking to cease all such
infringements on any and all of your web sites. Pending your response the FA
Premier League's rights are fully reserved.



We thank you for your cooperation.



Yours sincerely,

Tim Cooper

NetResult

A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House

583 Fulham Road

London

UK SW6 5UA



Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.





- --------------------------------------------------------------------

NetResult - World Leaders in Online Intellectual Property Management

- --------------------------------------------------------------------
